WARNING: PLEASE READ THE DISCLAIMER BEFORE USING THIS APPLICATION
 
The UVMe app device and sensor are tools to help you enjoy your time in the sun. The purpose of the sensor and the app is to help reduce Ultraviolet (UV) exposure and avoid skin damage such as sunburns and skin damage. It is for personal use and may not be used as for medicinal advice. The information provided is not intended for treatment, diagnoses, nor for prevent or curing any diseases. Persons using the data within for medical purposes such as avoiding sun exposure for medical purposes, should not rely solely on the accuracy of the data herein. Some medicines and over the-counter drugs can cause the skin to sunburn very quickly. Talk with a medical specialist or pharmacist. 
 
The calculations and formulas in the application are based on information provided by a variety of sources and cannot be exact. We do not have control on the accuracy of the input data by the users or their use of the device. The UVMe device can accurately measure UV ratings when properly used and functioning. 
 
The application without connection to the UVMe device cannot measure to the actual amount of UV. The application calculates the amount of UV radiation based on UV index data available from https://www.epa.gov. All UV index forecasts have inaccuracies because they are predictions. https://www.epa.gov cannot be held responsible for any consequences that may result from the use of this application.
 
Thank you for using UVMe.
